author: Boycat
title: Zorch review
review: Very unique mixel. Very fast according to his description and I like the flames that they added to show he goes fast. I understand mixels only have about 50 or 60 or so parts but this one only had 45 but overall, still a great mixel.

author: Trigger_
title: Not too bad of a set, but the worst Mixel, along with Globert
review:
Ugh... well, the title says it all, but I will list my reasons why:

  • The design is way too simple compared to other the others.
  • The arms are hinged, making them extremely restrictive.
  • Handlebar does not work well for eyebrows at all.

There are some good things like the teeth, eyes, and fire, but all of those are in other (and much better Mixels).

author: Master_Wu
title: Great for parts!
review:
I'm not a big fan of Mixels however, I have a few of them. This Mixel in particular has some excellent parts that can be used to build anything you want! The model itself would be better for a kid to play with. The flame pieces are a nice addition because you can usually only get those in fire fighter sets!

I recommend this set for any kid fan of lego, but the parts are good for anyone!
